name: Email Spam Detection using NLTK and Machine Learning
description: Leveraging natural language processing techniques and classification algorithms to identify and filter out unwanted or malicious emails from users' inboxes. Used NLTK library for text preprocessing and then built models for classification

name: Movie ratings prediction and analysis
description: Achieved 91% accuracy in predicting IMDb movie ratings using machine learning algorithms and neural networks such as Random Forest, XGBoost, and Decision Trees. Proficient in data processing and exploratory data analysis using Python facilitating informed decision-making.

name: Sentiment Analysis on Twitter dataset
description: Conducted sentiment analysis on Twitter data of 1.6M tweets for classification of tweets as positive or negative. Leveraged NLTK for text preprocessing, ML algorithms and keras library for building a classification model.

name: Real-time Chat Application
description: Developed ChitChat, an application enabling real-time private and group chat functionalities in MERN Stack. Implemented secure user authentication via email and responsive UI for seamless user experience.

name: Route2Care â€“ Web Based Pharmacy
description: Designed an E-commerce website for medicines with HTML, JavaScript and Django framework as backed. Integrated payment gateway and used Optical Character Recognition for prescriptions with 95% accuracy. .

name: Clinical Text Summarisation using LLMs
description: Implemented Text Generation and Summarization system using BERT and Summarizer Model to condense clinical transcriptions into concise summaries enhancing healthcare documentation.

name: Wolf Parking Management
description: Developed and implemented WolfParking, a SQL and Java parking management system for university campus, utilizing MariaDB. Designed functionalities for administrators to efficiently oversee parking lots, assign zones/spaces, issue permits, and enforce regulations through a command-line interface. Integrated MariaDB with Java using JDBC to enable seamless data operations
